answers.answer: Hello!I would suggest you to review all medications you are taking for any drug allergy.I would suggest you to check and monitor your blood pressure and also check your hemoglobin values.Go for fasting blood sugar and rule out diabetes.I would suggest you to follow up with a neurologist if the symptoms continue after taking some multivitamins (vitamin B12).Take care!

dear sirmy i have no blood sugar problem .my blood pressure is absolutely normal and hemoglobin is 12,6 months back while peeling potatoes i felt numbness in my one finger and then in the whole palm and foots.few years back i suffered from UTI infection,double typhoid and malaria at the same time,that time my weight was 39kg.but now its 50kg then also i feel weakness and my bones have also become week.my pulse rate increases when i try to do work, and the very next moment i start feeling immense weakness.please suggest me some thing.

Hello!I would suggest you to take multivitamins consisting of vitamin B12 for a month and also to do some physiotherapy of your fingers regularly. (Finger counting, finger flexing and extension).If the symptoms persist then you need to take an appointment near a rheumatologist to rule out rheumatoid arthritis, rheumatic fever, osteoarthritis etc.Take care!

question: dear sirfrom past 6 months i m feeling numbness in both of my hand and feet..can u please help me.
title: numbness
